text: Alloh Zote ast, ki hamai sumoro az jak saxs ʙijofarid, (ki on padari sumo Odam ast.) Va az Odam zanasro (Havvoro) ʙijofarid, to ʙa u oromis joʙad. Cun ʙo u daromext, ʙa ʙore saʙuk ʙordor sud va cande ʙo on ruzgorro ʙa sar ʙurd. Va cun ʙor vaznin gardid, on du nafar, Alloh, Parvardigori xesro ʙixondand, ki agar moro farzande soista dihi, az siposguzoron xohem ʙud
